forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 35. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 3pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 51. West wind 2 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
As the stillness of night embraces Boston, the air hangs with a crisp clarity, enveloping the city under a mostly cloudy blanket. With temperatures dipping into the cool embrace of low thirties, a gentle northwest wind stirs, beckoning you to wrap yourself snugly in warmth. These hours of darkness may feel quiet, yet anticipate the day ahead, when clouds will continue to weave their tapestry across the sky, occasionally allowing fleeting hints of the sun.

Upon the dawn, a slight chance of rain showers arrives, perhaps after a leisurely afternoon stroll. Though the spirit of the day holds a cool, muted promise, it whispers of the possibility of revitalizing rain. Dress in layers to navigate this capricious spring, opting for a light sweater or jacket—ideally one that shields against the chill yet breathes as the day warms, allowing you to venture out without fear of discomfort. Consider a walk along the riverbank or exploring one of Boston’s quaint cafés, where you can sip something warm while watching the weather shift outside—a perfect recipe for grounding, mundane pleasures that tie you to the pulse of the city.
